selectedVerses.text: let thorns grow instead of wheat, and foul weeds instead of barley."The words of Job are ended.
The field is the world, and the good seed is the children of the kingdom. The weeds are the sons of the evil one,
But he said, 'No, lest in gathering the weeds you root up the wheat along with them.
Just as the weeds are gathered and burned with fire, so will it be at the close of the age.
So when the plants came up and bore grain, then the weeds appeared also.
